input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following product keywords and product title.

Product title:
SPEEDO Aquablade Recordbreaker - Youth

Product keywords:
100% Polyester
Speedo Girl's Aquablade Recordbreaker Swimsuit
Speedo Girl's Aquablade Recordbreaker Swimsuit:
Go-To Competition Suit You Can Always Count-On for Great Comfort, Fit, & Performance
Stripes Create Channeling Effect to Streamline Water Away from Body
Fabric Offers Lower Drag Co-Efficient & is Slicker than Skin

Product description:
input_text.Response A: This is a swimsuit made of polyester fabric. It has stripes that help channel the water away from the body, which makes it more slippery than skin and thus lowers the drag coefficient. This swimsuit is good for competition because it offers great comfort, fit, and performance.
input_text.Response B: The Speedo Aquablade Recordbreaker is a great go-to competition suit that offers great comfort, fit, and performance. The suit is made of 100% polyester fabric that offers a lower drag coefficient and is slicker than skin. The stripes create a channeling effect thatstreamlines water away from the body. This suit is perfect for any competitive swimmer who wants to perform at their best.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.

label_annotations.factors_a: It is a decent description but is quite bland for a marketing description and doesn't particularly sell the product.
label_annotations.factors_b: Although the product is advertised well in the description, the bot has made a typo ('thatstreamlines') which stands out.
